item.title: Call for Papers
item.description: 2021: NDSS DNS Privacy Workshop - Call for Papers The 2021 workshop was a virtual online conference held on 21st February 2021. Workshop on DNS Privacy: Measuring deployment and effectiveness of encrypted DNS. Submission link: https://dnspriv21.hotcrp.com/ Background The landscape around DNS Privacy has changed dramatically in the last few years, with tremendous developments in multiple areas. These include Many new Internet Standards from the IETF primarily focussed on stub-to-recursive resolution privacy
